text: Ara yakhana tadera kache amadera suspasta nirdesabali patha kara haya takhana yara abisbasa posana kare tadera ceharate tumi asbikrtira paricaya pabe. Tara caya yara amadera banisamuha tadera kache pare sunaya tadera upare laphiye parate. Tumi bala -- ''ami ki tabe tomadera sambada deba e-sabera ceye'o manda kichura?â€™â€™ Aguna.
